Translations.Text: Feng zhiren zhi ci de an la zhi ming
yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, yangyu zhong shijie de zhu
zhiren zhi ci de zhu
baoying ri de zhu
Women zhi chongbai ni, women zhi qiu ni youzhu
Qiu ni yinling women shang zhenglu
ni suo youzhu zhe de lu, bushi shou qian nu zhe de lu, ye bushi mi wu zhe de lu
Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Zhe bu jing, qizhong hao wu keyi, shi jingwei zhe de xiangdao
Tamen quexin youxuan, jin shou bai gong, bing fen she wo suo gei yu tamen de
Tamen quexin jiang shi ni de jingdian, he zai ni yiqian jiang shi de jingdian, bingqie duxin houshi
Zhe deng ren, shi zunshou tamen de zhu de zhengdao de; zhe deng ren, que shi chenggong de
Buxindao zhe, ni dui tamen jiayi jinggao yu fou, zhe zai tamen shi yiyang de, tamen bijing bu xindao
An la yi fengbile tamen de xin he er, tamen de yan shang you yi mo; tamen jiang shou zhongda de xingfa
Youxie ren shuo:“Women yi xin'an la he morile.” Qishi tamen jue bushi xinshi
Tamen xiang qiman an la he xinshimen, qishi, tamen zhishi zi qi, que bu juewu
Tamen de xin li you bing, gu an la zengjiale tamen de xinbing; tamen jiang yin shuohuang er zaoshou zhongda de xingfa
Youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen buyao zai difang shang zuo'e.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Women zhishi tiaojie de ren.”
Zhen de, tamen que shi zuo'e zhe, dan tamen bu juewu
Youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang zhongren nayang xindao.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Women neng xiang yuren nayang qingxin ma?” Zhen de, tamen que shi yuren, dan tamen bu zhidao
Tamen yujian xinshimen jiu shuo:“Women yi xindaole.” Tamen huiqu jianle ziji de emo, jiu shuo:“Women que shi nimen de tong dang, women buguo shi yunong tamen bale.”
An la jiang yong tamen de yunong huan bao tamen, jiang ren sui tamen fanghuang yu beini zhi zhong
Zhe deng ren, yi zhengdao huanqu mi wu, suoyi tamen de jiaoyi bing wei huo li, tamen bushi zunxun zhengdao de
Tamen piru ran huo de ren, dang huoguang zhao liangle tamen de sizhou de shihou, an la ba tamen de huoguang na qu, rang tamen zai chongchong de hei'an zhong, shenme ye kan bujian
(Tamen) shi long de, shi ya de, shi xia de, suoyi tamen zhimibuwu
Huozhe ru zaoyu qingpen dayu zhe, yu li you chongchong hei'an, you you lei he dian, tamen kongpa zhen si, gu yong shouzhi sai zhu erduo, yi bi ji lei. An la shi zhouzhi bu xindao de renmen de

Dianguang jihu duoqule tamen de shijue, mei feng dianguang wei tamen er zhao liang de shihou, tamen zai dianguang zhong qianjin; hei'an de shihou, tamen jiu zhanzhu. Jiaru an la yiyu, ta bi chiduo tamen de tingjue he shijue. An la duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
Zhongren a! Nimen de zhu, chuangzaole nimen, he nimen yiqian de ren, nimen dang chongbai ta, yibian nimen jingwei

Ta yi dadi wei nimen de xi, yi tiankong wei nimen de mu, bingqie cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, er jie yushui shengchu xuduo guoshi, zuo nimen de jiyang, suoyi nimen buyao mingzhigufan de gei an la shuli pidi
Ruguo nimen huaiyi wo suo jiang shi gei wo de puren de jingdian, name, nimen shi nizuo yi zhang, bing she an la er qidao nimen de jianzheng zhemen, ruguo nimen shi chengshi de
Ruguo nimen buneng zuo——nimen jue buneng zuo——name, nimen dang fangbei huo yu, na shi yongren he shi zuo ranliao de, yi wei bu xindao de renmen yubei haole

Ni dang xiang xindao erqie xingshan de ren baoxi; tamen jiang xiangyou xuduo xia lin zhu he de leyuan, mei dang tamen deyi yuan li de yi zhong shuiguo wei jiyang de shihou, tamen dou shuo:“Zhe shi women yiqian suo shou ci de.” Qishi, tamen suo shou ci de shi leisi de. Tamen zai leyuan li jiang xiangyou chunjie de pei'ou, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong
